Package com.mimecast.robin.storage

Class LocalStorageClient

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.storage.LocalStorageClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
StorageClient
public class LocalStorageClient extends Object implements StorageClient
Local storage client implementation.

Saves files on disk.
